author: robertpR8647GB
title: London City Airport stay
text:
Another great stay, been here before and the room was clean, very functional and just what I needed.
Staff helpful, the proximity to the airport meant a certain amount of traffic, but stopped overnight and not a problem. Slept well., bed comfortable.
Room Tip: all good so far. See more room tips
